title: [P2] Agent/TUI runtime panic-path sweep
description: Audit runtime unwrap/expect/panic paths in agent+tui and harden any user-facing failure modes.

logs.msg: Runtime panic-path hardening in TUI render code: removed non-test unwraps in ANSI param parsing (chat_renderer) and word-break wrapping (table) to avoid potential panics on malformed input/edge iteration states. Validation: cargo test -q (444 pass), cargo clippy -q clean.
